short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all images on all pages to Watermelon Cat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About the plugin:

- On all websites you visit, images will be replaced by Watermelon Cat.

Privacy Information:

- This plugin does not use or store user or browsing information.
- The permission required during installation is necessary to enable image replacement.
- The code for this plugin is open source; you can review the code or contribute at https://github.com/AndreiLegram/nWatermelonCat
